question_text: Alan Turing's 1936 proof that no algorithm can determine whether an arbitrary program will halt uses which fundamental proof technique involving self-reference?
distractors: Reduction to the Post correspondence problem

question_text: In formal language theory, a formal language is defined as a set of strings whose symbols are drawn from what mathematical object?
correct_answer: A finite set called an alphabet
distractors: An infinite sequence called a stream
An ordered ring called a codomain
A recursive structure called a grammar
